Name: BITROOM
About the game: Photo Sensitivity Warning A small percentage of people may experience seizures when exposed to certain lights, patterns, or images, even if you have not had epilepsy or seizures in the past. BITROOM is not a long adventure story about a teenager named Max. Max is an ordinary schoolboy who dreams of becoming a game developer, but he did not expect that this would lead to such consequences. Gameplay The game contains the following gameplay elements: Weapon and combat system Dialogues and notes Challenging enemies Quick Time Event System And Much More! Game Styles The game combines a combination of 2D and 3D style. The entire environment is made in 3D style, while characters, enemies and elements of interaction are in 2D style. Difficult to understand Plot The game has a rather complicated plot and not everyone will be able to understand exactly what it is about the first time. It is recommended that you carefully delve into the dialogues and read all the notes scattered across the locations. Level Of Difficulty You cannot choose the difficulty level yourself, you need to carefully examine all the locations in order to know how you will have to act in the future if the enemy suddenly catches you by surprise. Try not to bypass additional locations, there can be a lot of useful things.
